Aristotle initiated Alexander the great into homosexuality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Thus this gruesome HOMOSEXUAL TRIO&nbsp;&nbsp;of Plato, Socrates and Aristotle laid the foundations of Western philosophy and science with stolen and patented knowledge .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Pythagoras gave his stolen Ayurveda ( excerpts from treatises of Susruta and Charaka ) to the grandfather of Hippocrates. In those days Greeks knew NOTHING of human anatomy and physiology because of the strict Greek taboo forbidding the dissection of human cadavers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Hippocrates , the FATHER OF WESTERN MEDICINE tried to fudge 6000 year old Ayurveda and give it his own spin. After all he was just a spin doctor, whose entire knowledge was from his grandfather.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Example :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In Ayurvedic medicine, there are 3 basic temperaments: Vata (gas), Pitta (bile) and Kapha (phlegm).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Hippocrates ( 460BC- 370 BC ) threw in one more most STUPID item ( blood\u2014TEE HEEE ) into the works.&nbsp;&nbsp;For in the Sushruta Samhita, it is stated that blood ( Rakta ) , is a DHATU&nbsp;&nbsp;in Ayurveda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">So his fudged treatise talks about - bilious (bile), sanguineous (blood),&nbsp;&nbsp;phlegmatic (phlegm) and atrabiliary (black bile).&nbsp;&nbsp;And he removed Vata ( gas ) \u2013the most important one.&nbsp;&nbsp;Show what an amazing idiot he is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Hippocrates the thief did several more spins in medicine-- that body is made of water, air, earth and fire.&nbsp;&nbsp;He left out vaccum of Ayurveda . In the Ayurvedic system, body is made of water, air, earth, fire and vacuum. Digestion is explained as cooking of food with the help of body-fire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Hippocrates theory that the human body is a microcosm of the universe is lifted from Ayurveda/ Upanishads .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Information about Hippocrates can also be found in the writings of Aristotle, which date from the 4th century BC.&nbsp;&nbsp;All newly qualified doctors take what is called the \u2018Hippocratic Oath\u2019- NOT knowing that he is NOT worth to take an oath on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Noting that Pythagoras got himself healed of Epilepsy, Hippocrates was absolutely cock sure of stating that epilepsy is NOT created by the Greek gods- and that like for every other illnesses it had a natural cause.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Stupid Hippocrates wrote that raw food is bad.&nbsp;&nbsp;Cant blame him, after all it was his grandfather who received third party stolen stuff.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Hippocrates mistook the Ayurvedic word&nbsp;&nbsp;AMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Ayurvedic word for toxins, ama, means, \"crude\" or \"raw\" - residues from faulty or incomplete pepsis that haven't been properly integrated into the body and its functioning, and therefore impede it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">OK, FOLKS, TIMES HAS NOW COME TO BUST A BOMBSHELL WHICH IS GONNA SHIVER YOUR TIMBERS&nbsp;&nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter Orpheus&nbsp;&nbsp;\u2013&nbsp;&nbsp;the Indian seer , a master musician and sitarist,&nbsp;&nbsp;the holy man who brought Pythagoras to Kerala by ship and took him back via Muzris ( Kodungallur\u2014 cultural centre of Calicut king&nbsp;&nbsp;) Bernice&nbsp;&nbsp;( Red sea port of Egypt ) and Alexandria ( Egypt ) .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus was a Brahmachari , a celebate sage who was a veena virtuoso.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Veena is the oldest musical instrument on the planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Jealous Aristotle and Plato tried to paint him as a homosexual and a woman hater, which he was NOT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Herodotus had clearly written that Orpheus who would play divine string music and tame wild animals came from India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus , a strict vegetarian introduced spirituality to Greece&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;He was known for the use of holy theertham from a copper bowl and a Tulsi ( basil) leaf which he used to keep in his mouth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Cicero called Orpheus , the tawny hued , a devotee of Bacchus ( Krishna ) crowned with kissos ( Tulsi).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Western historians and the Pope blurred&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus and Orpheus , and pretty soon it was Jesus who was attributed to all the qualities of Orpheus \u2013 enchanting wild animals with a 7 stringed lyre .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The original sitar ( derived from the veena&nbsp;&nbsp;) has seven strings&nbsp;&nbsp;which run over curved, raised frets ( Rudra / Saraswati veena) , and the remainder are sympathetic strings (tarb,&nbsp;&nbsp;taarif , tarafdaar) which run underneath the frets and resonate in sympathy with the played strings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It was Orpheus who gave Pythagoras&nbsp;&nbsp;the mathematical relations of the notes on the musical scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The wisdom of the ancients has been taught by the philosophers of Greece, but also by people called Jews in Syria, and by Brahmins in India.\"--Megasthenes- 300 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus the tawny hued Hindu Maharishi from Kerala, India gave music to the west.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Before that their music consisted of clanging rocks and shouting nonsense. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus also gave&nbsp;&nbsp;astrology and magic ( mantravadam ),&nbsp;&nbsp;vedic metaphysics ( magna grecia ) from Kerala to the west.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus was a master in astrology, and all Greek astrology is though Orpheus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Greeks spliced on the FAKE story of Eurydice to Orpheus, based on the MIRRORED version of ancient Hindu myth of Savitri and Satyavan.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This is about the efforts of Orpheus to retrieve his wife, Eurydice, (who was killed by a serpent on their wedding night ) from the underworld. Orpheus went down to Hades to claim her, and played so sweetly with his lute that Pluto allowed Eurydice to return to the earth with Orpheus, but on condition that he did not look behind him until he had reached the terrestrial regions. Orpheus, however, in his anxiety to see if she were following him, looked round, and Eurydice disappeared from his sight, instantly and forever.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This LOOKING BACK story is mirrored from the lore of Adi Shankaracharya bringing Devi to Kerala in 2000 BC \u2014&nbsp;&nbsp;he looked back and Devi disappeared at the spot of Mookambika temple at Kollur Karnataka.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Pythagoras learnt metempsychosis from India.&nbsp;&nbsp;Metempsychosis is the Greek equivalent of the 11000 year old Vedic Hindu doctrine of transmigration of the soul, Karma and and reincarnation after death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Almost every Greek text tells that Orpheos was famous for Ahimsa or non-violence . In Euripides' play Hippolytos a father taunts his son with the \"lifeless food\" he eats since taking Orpheos for his \"king.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus is praised for his knowledge of medicine and astrology ( ONLY Ayurveda and Indian astrology existed those days).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Punch into Google search-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MIHIRA MUNI , THE GREAT ASTROLOGER CUM ASTRONOMER VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The name of India, so far as is known, first appears in Greek literature in the 5th century B.C. in the works of Hekataios and Herodotos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Herodotos of Halikarnassos (484-425 B. C.) whose histories have survived in their entirety had written clearly about India .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Herodotos writes about India's population, saying that the Indians are \"more in number than any nation known to me.\u201d&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">He goes to great details while telling of Kerala\u2019s&nbsp;&nbsp;wealth in gold; He tells about&nbsp;&nbsp;Indian birds and beasts he regards as much bigger than those existing elsewhere, except for horses. Indian clothing he describes as made from wool growing on trees (i.e. cotton) and the amazing thin cotton Calico cloth , we use in Kerala as Mundu ( dhoti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Herodotos' most famous statement about India- that gold is produced in the Indian desert by fierce ants larger than foxes- , which appears to be bull, just for kicks.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unless these large ants were golden jackals who would call a nearby tiger .&nbsp;&nbsp;Such jackals had terrific night vision and sniffing ability ( excellent for bomb detection squads ) and leads the tiger to juicy prey , and then eats the left overs , which the grateful tiger deliberately leave behind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Many Indian seers visited Greece , as in 7000 BC, India ruled Palistan ( Palestine ) . Once when Socrates was asked by an Indian seer, what he does for a living . When Socrates replied that he \"investigated human life,\" the Indian laughed aloud , saying that \"no one was able to observe human affairs if he was ignorant of divine matters and consciousness .\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Vegetarianism in Greece is called Orphikos bios, or \"Orphic way of life\". Only Indians were vegetarians those days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Aristotle ran down OR rather tried to convert Orpheus to be a homosexual like him, just because of a song he wrote about a red-lipped boy on the ship Argos. ( AAHA red lips&nbsp;&nbsp;came out of sucking too hard TEE HEEEE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Both Orpeheus and the converted Pythagoras forbade the sacrifice of animals\u2014so there goes the western theory of animal sacrifice in Indian temples.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Let me quote ( I usually do NOT care for such third party references ) of the parallels between the Orphic path and the yogic as written by Joseph John Campbell :&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201ca system both of thought and practice, exactly paralleling that of Indian asceticism, was communicated by initiated masters to little circles of devotees.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The soul, it was declared, returned repeatedly to life, bound to the wheel of rebirth (compare the Sanskrit samsara).&nbsp;&nbsp;Through asceticism (Sanskrit, tapas), however, the body could be purged of its Titan dross (Sanskrit, mirjara, \u2018shedding\u2019) and the soul released (Sanskrit, moksha, \u2018release\u2019).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Also, rituals fostering meditation on the godly factor were of help (Sanskrit, bhakti, \u2018devotion\u2019).&nbsp;&nbsp;And when, at last, in rapture (samadhi), the initiate cleaved to his own intrinsic being (svasvarupman), he was divine (Shivaham, \u2018I am Shiva.\u2019)\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The gay side kick of Aristotle wrote : \u201c Orpheus so hated women he chose to be reborn as a motherless swan\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is a pity that he visited India , yet he knew nothing of Brahmacharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">However Plato respects Orpheus for his poetry ,the sweet hymns&nbsp;&nbsp;of the hexameter form that revolutionized Greek poetry.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For Greek / Latin classics Homer's Iliad and Odyssey and Virgil's Aeneid have inherent the Dactylic hexameter ( heroic hexameter)&nbsp;&nbsp;a form of meter in poetry or a rhythmic scheme, like the metered Sanskrit verses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The mysterious The Testament of Orpheus was the most important Orphic document for six centuries after it\u2019s \u201cdiscovery\u201d circa 300 AD.&nbsp;&nbsp;In it Orpheus says when in Egypt he met Moses who taught him about monotheism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A circa 350 AD hematite magic amulet, once in the collection of the Berlin Museum, depicted a man crucified on a cross with a moon and seven stars above his head and the words Orpheoc Bakkikoc.&nbsp;&nbsp;It was declared to be a forgery by a furious pope Pius XII.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Orphic doctrine was purely vedic Indian and&nbsp;&nbsp;remained on a mythological plane, interpreting the universe in terms of personalized deities and procreation. Pythagoras refined and rationalized it and grabbed the glory later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A Indian Christian trader named Theophilos, from originally from Kerala and resident in Socotra island ( Aloe vera trade ) undertook several missionary journeys on behalf of the Roman emperor Constantius in the mid-4th century.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;He writes of a small Christian community in on the Malabar coast which traces its origins to Jesus' disciples Thomas and&nbsp;&nbsp;Bartholomew.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Bartholomew is one of the 12 disciples of Jesus and ismentioned in three Synoptic gospels: Matthew,[10:1\u20134] Mark,[3:13\u201319] and Luke,[6:12\u201316] and also appears as one of the witnesses of the Ascension[Acts 1:4,12,13]; however, each time he is named in the company of Philip.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">He is not mentioned in Gospel of John.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; JETHRO A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WAS A VEGETARIAN..<br />\n<br />\nBULLSHIT BIBLICAL STORIES TALK ABOUT MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT-- SORRY- THERE ARE NO SUCH MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT<br />\n<br />\nJESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED--RED SEA NEVER PARTED--ALL THIS IS A FUCKIN' LIE !<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1), a tribe descending from Keturah, a wife of Abraham (Genesis 25:1-2). Genesis (25:6) describes that Abraham sent the sons of Keturah to the East.<br />\n<br />\nRabbi Menashe Ben Israel (Glazerson, 1984) asserts that Abraham sent them to land of OPHIR ( North Kerala ) by ship<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro.<br />\n<br />\nThen Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.\"<br />\n<br />\nJethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It sounds like Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself. According to Exodus, \"Moses did all that he [Jethro] had said.\"<br />\n<br />\nBefore returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN SEVERAL TIMES THAT JETHRO ( BEING AN INDIAN ) WAS SUBSTITUTED BY JEWS. JETHRO WAS SUNK AND BURIED BY WHITE JEWS<br />\n<br />\nThe first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro<br />\n<br />\nJethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation-- Hindu Jethro instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood<br />\n<br />\nMoses asked Jethro to be his guide<br />\n<br />\nIn The Midrash Rabbah (1977, Vol. 3: Numbers, p. 90) it is stated: \"The east ( OPHIR ) is the source from which light goes forth into the world, and there camped the standard of Judah which bred kings, scholars, and men of pious deeds.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLegends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water with special healing powers from India.<br />\n<br />\nAnd in Volume 1, page 11, of The Legends of the Jews, it is written: \"Beyond the inhabited parts to the east is Paradise with its seven divisions, each assigned to the pious of a certain degree.\"<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_106MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_106BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535264994347#c2766037549176043609\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 11:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWAS SARASWATI RIVER A MORE HOLY RIVER THAN GANGES<br />\n<br />\nYES!<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AYURVEDA USED SARASWATI RIVER WATER BEFORE THE RIVER WENT DRY..<br /><br />SARASWATI RIVER HAD AXOLOTLS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">GANGES RIVER HAS MACROPHAGES</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAxolotl is a species of aquatic salamander. Unlike humans, it has the \u201csuperpower\u201d of regenerating its limbs, spinal cord, heart, and other organs..<br />\n<br />\nYoung frogs are known to regrow limbs, though they lose this ability when they change from tadpoles to adult frogs. On the other hand, the axolotl retains it throughout its entire life, making it unique among vertebrates<br />\n<br />\nHumans have also been known to regenerate the tips of the fingers, including the bone and skin. I once lost the tip of my left forefinger on the ship--it has regrown fully.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF CHEMICAL POLLUTION FOR TANNERIES, GANGES MACROPHAGES HAVE LOST THEIR ANCIENT POWERS OF REGENERATION..<br />\n<br />\nInjecting a drug to get rid of macrophages in an axolotl\u2019s limb before amputation leads to the accumulation of scar tissue instead of regrowth..<br />\n<br />\nThis scarring, which happens when a protein called collagen becomes disordered, is a normal part of wound healing in humans, but it is unusual in axolotls. This result suggests that macrophages are essential for regeneration<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls stay 'babies' for their whole lives. Axolotls are neotenic creatures meaning they achieve sexual maturity without losing any of their larval features<br />\n<br />\nIf an axolotl is given a shot of iodine, it will experience a rush of hormones that triggers the animal's growth processes, and it will \"grow up\" and resemble a mature tiger salamander, their closest relative.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, this is not the axolotl's natural state. \"Grown-up\" axolotls are typically listless and die about a year after the injection.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls can regenerate pretty much any body part. A number of amphibians are capable of regenerating limbs, but axolotls take this habit up a notch by regenerating jaws, spinal cords, skin and even portions of their brain. Axolotls can also receive organ transplants and will not reject the new organ.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls have a genome 10 times the size of the human genome..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0GJOjfYn74</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_70B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1061350286957344881\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_70M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/17821568266464145690\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">CK</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535398556183#c1061350286957344881\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 28, 2018 at 1:05 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_70MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px;\">\nPranam Captain Ajit,<br />\nSir if water has memory, and Axolotls have such phenomenal regenerative superpowers, then the water had this imprinted within, making it \"holier\" in its power than the Ganga waters.<br />\nAlso, is it correct to assume Danavas were closer to Mayans and Aztecs than Vedics of the later period. Excuse me if my understanding is mundane. The Aztecs for example conisdered Axolotls their \"Lightning God\", who built their capital cities on islands in the lakes inhabited by the creatures, until the spanish stopped this.<br />\n<br />\nWith Gratitude</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_70MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_70BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_70B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_71B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5679665444483105427\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CRUSADES --&nbsp; PLUNDER AND SLAUGHTER AT JERUSALEM ( FIRST CRUSADE ) AND CONSTANTINOPLE ( FOURTH CRUSADE ) -- &nbsp;PETER THE HERMIT --&nbsp; SALADIN - PARASMANI --&nbsp; SHIVA LINGAM BLACK STONE -- SWASTIKA AND STAR OF DAVID SIGNS-- POPE URBAN 2 - </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--AK2gjG7GLk/TjuTeG0ey4I/AAAAAAAAFDM/CvMxOCGjx1g/s1600/imagesCAE8JUNX.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--AK2gjG7GLk/TjuTeG0ey4I/AAAAAAAAFDM/CvMxOCGjx1g/s400/imagesCAE8JUNX.jpg\" width=\"338\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1088, Pope Urban 2 had a problem. The Eastern orthodox church who did NOT recognise the Pope was getting too powerful.&nbsp; </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hmCmd6UPKqU/TjuToy85iYI/AAAAAAAAFDQ/LMEEtgzeBmo/s1600/PH.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hmCmd6UPKqU/TjuToy85iYI/AAAAAAAAFDQ/LMEEtgzeBmo/s400/PH.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">More Christians were joining the rival camp, where all Bishops held equal power, and people were NOT willing to accept a middleman or broker between themselves , and their God Jesus Christ. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LYwlbdHRYEs/TjuTyisATSI/AAAAAAAAFDU/K1HTU7D9zs8/s1600/NB.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LYwlbdHRYEs/TjuTyisATSI/AAAAAAAAFDU/K1HTU7D9zs8/s400/NB.png\" width=\"289\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though the Pope was powerful enough to even ex-communicate a King, the Kings did NOT care. For the Pope did NOT have economical and military might.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ysgYdepk8hg/TjuT574itsI/AAAAAAAAFDY/4MWmXjsL3yY/s1600/aa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ysgYdepk8hg/TjuT574itsI/AAAAAAAAFDY/4MWmXjsL3yY/s400/aa.jpg\" width=\"277\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So he hatched a multi-pronged conspiracy, by using a <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>half mad unkempt monk from Amiens , by the name of Peter the Hermit. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HMJdA_cSXro/TjuUFCGk7YI/AAAAAAAAFDc/TZID3DBx_24/s1600/imagesCAZYZCVI.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HMJdA_cSXro/TjuUFCGk7YI/AAAAAAAAFDc/TZID3DBx_24/s400/imagesCAZYZCVI.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This intense personality always dressed up in rags and walked barefooted, even in the cold, and was an enigma. He send him to Jerusalem and then called him back , to make a couple of shocking announcements. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3M3g0KqvZyw/TjuULPEuHaI/AAAAAAAAFDg/ukTKvPUn3ag/s1600/imagesCA5ZZPF6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"314\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3M3g0KqvZyw/TjuULPEuHaI/AAAAAAAAFDg/ukTKvPUn3ag/s400/imagesCA5ZZPF6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter the Hermit , the perfect rabble rouser , went around riding a donkey, and told the people that the Muslim Religion was posing a threat to the Christians, and gave bullshit about Christians getting massacred and tortured in Jerusalem, while actually all religions were co-existing peacefully there. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mTVwVWcV2o8/TjuUSCusFTI/AAAAAAAAFDk/nAdAF_FvBr8/s1600/imagesCAFYKX3O.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mTVwVWcV2o8/TjuUSCusFTI/AAAAAAAAFDk/nAdAF_FvBr8/s640/imagesCAFYKX3O.jpg\" width=\"455\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He declared that he had seen the Holy Grail, which contained Jesus\u2019s blood, (collected at the crucifixion by Joseph of Arimathea) <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>and also the wooden cross on which Jesus was crucified\u2014whipping up passion that it must be retrieved from Muslim ruled Jerusalem \u2013and God had willed it in a meeting with him. He crossed the Alps and whipped up passions in other European countries too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PN4PgA_Uu8Y/TjuUusnFbnI/AAAAAAAAFDo/emTnWW0DIYI/s1600/imagesCADSF1DA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter the Hermit, evoked the Pope\u2019s commitment by stating that there was a PARASMANI or philosophers stone ( transmutation to gold ) in the underground vaults of Old Solomon\u2019s temple. </span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jz3OKjHdKUU/Tjui3Fm_e0I/AAAAAAAAFGA/igHUaS-YQJo/s1600/imagesCAEVR9BC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"213\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jz3OKjHdKUU/Tjui3Fm_e0I/AAAAAAAAFGA/igHUaS-YQJo/s320/imagesCAEVR9BC.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope knew that this is the holy Grail. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>He said that the patriarch of Jerusalem had seen it. This was originally a Shiva temple holding a powerful black meteorite stone constructed during the reign of Indian Aryan Vedic Emperor Vikramaditya in 7000 BC. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VFy5mAHa1kY/TjuU4pT5XSI/AAAAAAAAFDs/9cPU3Uxk7eQ/s1600/Yogiraj_GuruNath__Siddhanath_Shivalinga_Abhishek.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VFy5mAHa1kY/TjuU4pT5XSI/AAAAAAAAFDs/9cPU3Uxk7eQ/s400/Yogiraj_GuruNath__Siddhanath_Shivalinga_Abhishek.jpg\" width=\"265\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This black stone ( Shiva Lingam ) of<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>Jerusalem was <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>more powerful than the broken up black stone inset at the SE corner of the Kaaba Mecca. A piece of it is still in the Dome of the rock at Jerusalem , concealed\u2014to prevent theft.&nbsp;<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 10<sup>th</sup> century the powerful ( on Chakras ) Mecca Shiva lingam was broken by invaders , and now it is pieced together in a silver envelope, with the biggest part peeping ( 7 inches long and 4 inches wide ) protruding out. </span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; </span>Punch into google search SUPERPANCHATANTRA VADAKAYIL to read about this 3000 story collection.</span></i></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; But then 200 years ago all modern electricity/ electronics was bullshit too right? <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></i><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Even today without a powerful channeling stone, you can still have this transmutation technology by using a Tesla coil and a Van de Graff generator. Using radiowave interference of low energy input, but at exceedingly high voltages, you can&nbsp; fracture metals with resonance tunneling vibration and cold fuse metals in a friendly&nbsp;manner. Because NO heat will be generated, and this goes against classical Thermodynamics physics laws.&nbsp;<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;Dimitry Mendeleyeev based his periodic table on Sanskrit sound alphabets.</span></span></span></span></i><br />\n<br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Things here happen faster than light using Scalar forces which have only magnitude, no direction. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>You don\u2019t need a particle accelerator and atom smasher, to defeat Vander Waals forces. <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way, PARASMANI is useless in the hands of a man without superior consciousness , 12 strand DNA and a king sized resonating pineal gland. Like a radio is of NO use in the hands of a man who cannot tune it.<o:p></o:p></span></i><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bVSyRb4fWOE/TjuVXihjCEI/AAAAAAAAFD0/0y8caiijf9Y/s1600/imagesCAEH345E.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bVSyRb4fWOE/TjuVXihjCEI/AAAAAAAAFD0/0y8caiijf9Y/s400/imagesCAEH345E.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nThe Parasmani is subverted in Indiana Jones, Raiders of the lost arc, and Harry Potter ( philosophers stone ) &nbsp;movie, to suit the director's imagination.<br />\n<br />\nIsaac Newton got his entire Calculus ready made by&nbsp;East India company ( Dutch wing ) who stole it from Calicut Zamorin in 1602.&nbsp; Newton just translated it from Sanskrit to English by using a translator mathematician . <br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1jfZHBCFtOw/TjvwNm34dLI/AAAAAAAAFG0/eqMdlkiPVms/s1600/imagesCAATR63V.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1jfZHBCFtOw/TjvwNm34dLI/AAAAAAAAFG0/eqMdlkiPVms/s1600/imagesCAATR63V.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-P-owaG0RUzg/TjvwSKctYbI/AAAAAAAAFG4/pHaql_RSLyA/s1600/sss.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-P-owaG0RUzg/TjvwSKctYbI/AAAAAAAAFG4/pHaql_RSLyA/s400/sss.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nNewton also had the same Vedic Parasmani ( Philosophers transmutation stone ) texts the Templars excavated from the basement of Solomon's temple. The Calicut palm sheafs , were&nbsp;handed over to him at England .<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--9hWjK_9sLw/TjvyDid-BHI/AAAAAAAAFG8/coaRInRcFl8/s1600/asd.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"221\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--9hWjK_9sLw/TjvyDid-BHI/AAAAAAAAFG8/coaRInRcFl8/s320/asd.png\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nIn his excitement of doing&nbsp;the occult he lit candles all over -- Druid style-- and his dog upset the candle and set the precious papers on fire.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xZoQZaZu7Qs/TjvyJ9xnLTI/AAAAAAAAFHA/MbXJg7D24oQ/s1600/untitledwww.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xZoQZaZu7Qs/TjvyJ9xnLTI/AAAAAAAAFHA/MbXJg7D24oQ/s1600/untitledwww.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nStill Newton went ahead and wrote his own bullshit take from what little he undertood. He is NOT destined for glory, as his horsocope tells --it will be a dog's end.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kURbdeIPjVU/TjvzympLE-I/AAAAAAAAFHE/R40lF1jsE5c/s1600/wer.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kURbdeIPjVU/TjvzympLE-I/AAAAAAAAFHE/R40lF1jsE5c/s1600/wer.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pope could NOT carry out the crusades and grab unlimited 3 pronged power ( spiritual/ military/ financial ) unless the Kings of England, France , Germany, Italy , and Spain played ball\u2014and provided the money power and the man power. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qmfrSX6SoD0/TjuW4scJirI/AAAAAAAAFD4/0E89oAfEDPw/s1600/CV.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"321\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qmfrSX6SoD0/TjuW4scJirI/AAAAAAAAFD4/0E89oAfEDPw/s640/CV.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So he brainwashed them into considering , about how to get out of the Dark ages for ever. </span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">He told the French king about controlling the spice routes to Constantinope. Constantinope was the outlet hub port for spices from Calicut , Kerala , India .&nbsp; </span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">How right he was-- todays <span style=\"color: red;\">Black Nobility</span> are the families who made a fantastic fortune out of spice trade from my hometown Calicut via Constantinope and Jerusalem..</span> </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D6gfHATKzAg/TjuXD1OLKBI/AAAAAAAAFD8/7ifSpOXntAA/s1600/TY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D6gfHATKzAg/TjuXD1OLKBI/AAAAAAAAFD8/7ifSpOXntAA/s320/TY.jpg\" width=\"307\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The spices were exported from Calicut by ship, and it was offloaded at Aden Yemen and Salalah Oman. From there it went by caravan route via Mecca ( an important watering hole with a powerful Shiva temple ) to Jerusalem/ Constantinople. Constantinople got caravan feed from Calicut- Basra trade too. From Constantinople the spices went to Europe by ships.</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--l8Jqy5BP8I/TjuXMdbbTUI/AAAAAAAAFEA/yIzpRmeDQYQ/s1600/imagesCA092F8K.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--l8Jqy5BP8I/TjuXMdbbTUI/AAAAAAAAFEA/yIzpRmeDQYQ/s640/imagesCA092F8K.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In those days Constantinope was under the Byzantine Eastern orthodox church. They did NOT recognise the Pope. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Jerusalem was under the Muslim rule. Both places prospered under the spice trade. King Solomon used his own ships to trade with Calicut and his ships went straight from Calicut to Aqaba. Solomon\u2019s palace staircase was made of Sandalwood and teak\u2014available only from Calicut port.&nbsp;<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span></span></i><br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\"><br /></span></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EG-uh-8X3zs/TjuqQkhd3OI/AAAAAAAAFGQ/W7CLpzrfC9c/s1600/imagesCA4SFBGT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EG-uh-8X3zs/TjuqQkhd3OI/AAAAAAAAFGQ/W7CLpzrfC9c/s400/imagesCA4SFBGT.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the Arabs had the lions share of the trade , as they had been middlemen right from the days of Pharoah, who wanted Cinnamon and Aloe Vera for making Frankincense . </span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NUZUZiNho7s/TjuqdpV3AWI/AAAAAAAAFGY/VCekPp58uU0/s1600/images%252B%2525282%252529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NUZUZiNho7s/TjuqdpV3AWI/AAAAAAAAFGY/VCekPp58uU0/s400/images%252B%2525282%252529.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZYMLFMVTojM/TjuqVoTiNlI/AAAAAAAAFGU/mZeB2-jqJzw/s1600/000%252B%2525287%252529%252B%2525281%252529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calicut sailors had planted Aloe Vera at Socotra on request from Pharoah, who sent his needs by swift carrier pigeons and hawks. </span></i><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wNV5a_UVo2U/TjuqJqujhSI/AAAAAAAAFGM/s6_P7sG8Iok/s1600/pyramid%252Bbuilder.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wNV5a_UVo2U/TjuqJqujhSI/AAAAAAAAFGM/s6_P7sG8Iok/s400/pyramid%252Bbuilder.jpg\" width=\"275\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
