font-size: x-large;\"> U</span> mark etched deeply on the arm.&nbsp; &nbsp;Below is Lord Ayyapa ( avatar of Vishnu ) with U mark on forehead.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mKg8hfVSp6E/TjzJ0jil47I/AAAAAAAAFHw/h0H3id54z7A/s1600/images%252B%2525283%252529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mKg8hfVSp6E/TjzJ0jil47I/AAAAAAAAFHw/h0H3id54z7A/s1600/images%252B%2525283%252529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pharoahs architects were Vishnu maharshis ( Vaishnavites ) &nbsp;, highly evolved seers with 12 strand&nbsp;DNA &nbsp;from Calicut. This tradition of sending hawks from Jerusalem was started by Emperor Vikramaditya and his hawks had the royal Swastika symbol attached to their legs.</span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kRwgzjK5Tmc/TjugnDI9w2I/AAAAAAAAFFk/C7A1ZWog9wo/s1600/images%252B%252870%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kRwgzjK5Tmc/TjugnDI9w2I/AAAAAAAAFFk/C7A1ZWog9wo/s400/images%252B%252870%2529.jpg\" width=\"396\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Calicut kings had the Dravidian emblem of the six pointed star, symbolizing Anahata Chakra , <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>on the legs of their hawks.</span>&nbsp; The six point star below is from a 7000 year old dravidian temple.</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-K2myf-Rm5f8/Tjug4g-vXRI/AAAAAAAAFFo/1l0OTai-fZs/s1600/images%252B%252823%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-K2myf-Rm5f8/Tjug4g-vXRI/AAAAAAAAFFo/1l0OTai-fZs/s400/images%252B%252823%2529.jpg\" width=\"308\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So today if Swastika signs were found in far off places like Troy and Cyprus , lost pigeons are the reason. Cyprus was under the rule of Vikramaditya too, and had several Shiva temples ( read as PAGAN temples ) with the black meteorite Shiva Lingam stone. Whenever the Jews talked about PAGAN temples, read as Vedic Hindu temples.&nbsp; Hinduism is 11000 years old\u2014 7000 years older than the second oldest Buddhism / Jainism. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Jewish ,Christianity , Islam are all recent religions. </span></i><br />\n<br />\n<i style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; text-align: justify;\"><b>Below: &nbsp;6000 year old Lord Rama and Hanuman carvings in Silemania, &nbsp;Iraq.</b></i><br />\n<i style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; text-align: justify;\"><b><br /></b></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-i9LuSXVceBA/VAB96j_ShlI/AAAAAAAAvVc/wdmle3wyjg4/s1600/Silemania%2Bprovince%2BIraq.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-i9LuSXVceBA/VAB96j_ShlI/AAAAAAAAvVc/wdmle3wyjg4/s1600/Silemania%2Bprovince%2BIraq.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HjHkHpb9Ip4/TjugbP7gzlI/AAAAAAAAFFg/gO8RvfRoxcg/s1600/imagesCATT3ZOD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HjHkHpb9Ip4/TjugbP7gzlI/AAAAAAAAFFg/gO8RvfRoxcg/s1600/imagesCATT3ZOD.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hilter tried to grab Swastika sign for himself, NOT knowing that Shiva\u2019s son Ganesha has it inscribed on his palm\u2014and Harappa excavations of 4000 BC revealed Ganesha tablets in Swastika inset. And Ganesha is NOT blue eyed or blonde, rather he is half elephant.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-seTYufUG7ME/TjuXhWaSYlI/AAAAAAAAFEE/KesNUmDIBsY/s1600/imagesCA86RS1G.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"136\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-seTYufUG7ME/TjuXhWaSYlI/AAAAAAAAFEE/KesNUmDIBsY/s400/imagesCA86RS1G.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the European kings were very much impressed by a plan to usurp Constantinople and Jerusalem in one shot. All are happy. People get their holy grail, Kings gets their moolah and Pope grabs his 3 pronged supreme power.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But this dirty plan killed more Christians than Muslims on the final count after 9 crusades. Jerusalem was usurped in the FIRST CRUSADE. The Crusaders killed only the Jews and Muslims. </span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The FOURTH CRUSADE killed Eastern orthodox Christians in Constantinople , who had a common god with the crusaders\u2014but only difference was they did NOT care for a middleman with a hotline to God the evil Pope.<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CUBXgh6Pc00/TjuXp1nYaAI/AAAAAAAAFEI/S1tc7FR4ldQ/s1600/hh.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"415\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CUBXgh6Pc00/TjuXp1nYaAI/AAAAAAAAFEI/S1tc7FR4ldQ/s640/hh.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pope Gregory IX ( 1062-1070 AD) authorized the Inquisition, including burning at the stake. This evil inquisition interrogated, accused, confiscated property, imprisoned, tortured, and murdered thousands of people through hundreds of years<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me talk about the nine crusades in greater detail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FIRST CRUSADE ( 1097 TO 1099 ) CALLED BY POPE<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>URBAN 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_U0UzV0UvdI/TjuXy6lvdXI/AAAAAAAAFEM/r9pVUBL2WBQ/s1600/NB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_U0UzV0UvdI/TjuXy6lvdXI/AAAAAAAAFEM/r9pVUBL2WBQ/s400/NB.jpg\" width=\"343\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter the Hermit went around the country side having his own passionate meetings, where he told the na\u00efve people that <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>God has requested him to ensure that the Muslims in Jerusalem are driven out. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>He produced a letter written by God and delivered to him personally by Jesus\u2014this fancy letter was cooked up by Pope Urban 2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P-14dGQdvCI/TjuX9dti8vI/AAAAAAAAFEQ/wjCuafAU0Ms/s1600/PETR+THE+HERMIT+-FIRST+CRUSADE.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P-14dGQdvCI/TjuX9dti8vI/AAAAAAAAFEQ/wjCuafAU0Ms/s1600/PETR+THE+HERMIT+-FIRST+CRUSADE.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pope Urban 2 held his own meeting in Clermont, attended by more than 200 bishops on 27<sup>th</sup> Nov 1095. He said that it was God\u2019s will that Christians should go to Jerusalem and fight. All those who fought and killed Muslims in Jerusalem would be assured a place in heaven . God had even willed robbers and criminals to fight the Holy war or Crusade at Jerusalem, for which their past sins would be forgiven. </span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the first to jump into the fray were the thieves and criminals. They found a golden opportunity to rape and plunder at will, sanctioned by God. Pope Urban 2 shouted again and again \u201c DEUS LO VOLT!!\u201d \u2013God wills it\u2014and whipped up a frenzy, <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>never seen before. God would be their guide and they would set off by summer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ps1N9IUIBik/TjuYEPFwzMI/AAAAAAAAFEU/9kXzbhE4PXc/s1600/imagesCA0GO8DB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"326\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ps1N9IUIBik/TjuYEPFwzMI/AAAAAAAAFEU/9kXzbhE4PXc/s400/imagesCA0GO8DB.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A great army of 110000 , mainly French peasants set of on 15<sup>th</sup> Aug 1096, <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>screaming \u201cDeus Lo Volt!\u201d . <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>A lot of the army saw this as their only way to heaven. All of them wore on their right shoulder an emblem of the cross. Nobles in England, Italy and France send their knights and their money to finance the crusade.&nbsp;<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NiuUAgXgu68/TjuYLgVWrAI/AAAAAAAAFEY/rmdUmS7Rjts/s1600/PL.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NiuUAgXgu68/TjuYLgVWrAI/AAAAAAAAFEY/rmdUmS7Rjts/s400/PL.jpg\" width=\"333\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were more than 10000 knights. Godfroi de Bouillon was the military leader and Peter the Hermit was the spiritual leader. Godfroi was promised to be crowned the King of Jerusalem, so he renounced his fiefs and sold everything back home and set out. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>He did NOT intend to return back. For food this army stole and pillaged on the way. On the way to Jerusalem Peter the hermit stayed back to scout around ( probably for weapons of mass destruction and for painting future target ) at Constantinope .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J756gBbgup8/TjuYWe72YvI/AAAAAAAAFEc/jzbRx7_WFis/s1600/imagesCA9LV95N.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"362\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J756gBbgup8/TjuYWe72YvI/AAAAAAAAFEc/jzbRx7_WFis/s640/imagesCA9LV95N.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jews and Muslims fought together to defend Jerusalem against this Christian army. This something like Saddam and USA fighting together against the Iranians or Osama bin Laden and Bush fighting together against Russians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zuDotHsa-8I/TjuYgA5LXUI/AAAAAAAAFEg/OrYc-51vv84/s1600/xx.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"222\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zuDotHsa-8I/TjuYgA5LXUI/AAAAAAAAFEg/OrYc-51vv84/s400/xx.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jerusalem fell on July 15<sup>th</sup> 1099 <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>. . By this time only 50000 of the army remained, due to an engagement with Turks and the siege at Antioch. . </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FusiKHdxb5Q/TjuY3U6lusI/AAAAAAAAFEk/bURi30QLh-Y/s1600/xx.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"321\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FusiKHdxb5Q/TjuY3U6lusI/AAAAAAAAFEk/bURi30QLh-Y/s400/xx.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">For some unknown reason they disemboweled EVERY SINGLE Muslim\u2014men, women and children , 72000 of them. The blood was knee deep, inside King Solomons temple.</span> </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KUb3c9g0XEc/TjuZKc2uhwI/AAAAAAAAFEo/Km-EpFIq73Y/s1600/imagesCA0C9700.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KUb3c9g0XEc/TjuZKc2uhwI/AAAAAAAAFEo/Km-EpFIq73Y/s400/imagesCA0C9700.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today uttering the word crusade is a whiplash for every Muslim. Such cruel barbarism has never ever been witnessed by this planet again. This crusade united the Sunni and Shia factions of Muslim religion. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GRdpmikN0pE/TjuZSqKmRrI/AAAAAAAAFEs/IKmNxFrTxII/s1600/imagesCAD7V2OT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GRdpmikN0pE/TjuZSqKmRrI/AAAAAAAAFEs/IKmNxFrTxII/s400/imagesCAD7V2OT.jpg\" width=\"317\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later Saladin a Shia Kurd would lead a mixed Sunni Shia army and take back Jerusalem. The crusaders cross adopted by the Red Cross in unacceptable to a Muslim in these modern times. The crusades are a classic example what evil organized religion can do. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By 1143, the Templars had become the exclusive military arm of the Papacy, and remained a powerful force in Outremer even after the fall of Jerusalem to Saladin in 1187.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1HV2K0bUthw/TjuafOZz9QI/AAAAAAAAFFM/wzhrgBfXu7I/s1600/imagesCA6LZFJW.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1HV2K0bUthw/TjuafOZz9QI/AAAAAAAAFFM/wzhrgBfXu7I/s400/imagesCA6LZFJW.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>In 1118 AD a strange thing happened. Nine new Knights arrived in Jerusalem. These Knights, were unlike the others and it was clear that they not interested in wealth. </span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PW_5Dr_b0nw/Tjuhceb8Z2I/AAAAAAAAFFs/c1YQ1qVWSX4/s1600/imagesCA2B5894.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"372\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PW_5Dr_b0nw/Tjuhceb8Z2I/AAAAAAAAFFs/c1YQ1qVWSX4/s400/imagesCA2B5894.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They had a sense of purpose and chose to live in an old set of stables, which had once belonged to King Herod from Roman times.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These nine Knights were led by Hugues de Payen, a French and Scottish mix . </span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-La-zVy8HnzI/TjuhkVpBh0I/AAAAAAAAFFw/uxQs7o2Jpi0/s1600/pp.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-La-zVy8HnzI/TjuhkVpBh0I/AAAAAAAAFFw/uxQs7o2Jpi0/s400/pp.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These stables were adjoining the ruins of <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>old Jewish Temple of Jerusalem, which had been destroyed by the Romans in about 300 AD. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3q2TWH3R8Hw/TjuaWZT5E1I/AAAAAAAAFFI/Dgs6te7tETI/s1600/imagesCA72IOHC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"317\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3q2TWH3R8Hw/TjuaWZT5E1I/AAAAAAAAFFI/Dgs6te7tETI/s400/imagesCA72IOHC.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These 9 were the original knights of the Templar. They dug tunnels round the clock for 8 dang years , and did NOT allow anybody else to come near them. </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BsuKIZ64rZA/Tjuh5MzXS_I/AAAAAAAAFF4/5HMfVpVlDgY/s1600/imagesCAB3FVQ3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BsuKIZ64rZA/Tjuh5MzXS_I/AAAAAAAAFF4/5HMfVpVlDgY/s400/imagesCAB3FVQ3.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is reputed that they found ancient Vedic scrolls in Sanskrit giving them secrets of alchemy and MUDRA- from the days of Emperor Vikramaditya.&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><em><span style=\"color: blue;\">It is also reputed that they found the Holy Grail which is nothing but a jar of Soma ( the super LSD ) , which resonated their DNA with their Pineal glands, to widen their perception. They also found a powerful SOLID MERCURY SHIVA LINGAM ( Parad )</span></em></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lAcBgKSo7G4/TjujCnd-8iI/AAAAAAAAFGI/kd_lJj1-eLM/s1600/imagesCAIK29CT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lAcBgKSo7G4/TjujCnd-8iI/AAAAAAAAFGI/kd_lJj1-eLM/s400/imagesCAIK29CT.jpg\" width=\"265\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They also found a black\nShiva Lingam ( meteorite stone ) which was called the Stone of Scone . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1296 the original\nblack Shiva lingam stone was captured by Edward I as spoils of war and taken to\nWestminster Abbey, where it was fitted into a wooden chair, known as King\nEdward's Chair, on which almost all English sovereigns have been crowned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the years the original\nblack stone has disappeared and a duplicate red sand stone put in its place.\nThe stone of Scone is none other than the Shiva Lingam black meteorite stone\nused by Jacob as a pillow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Stone, &nbsp;was mentioned in Macbeth: \"... [we shall\ntravel to be] crowned at Scone ..\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The duplicate Stone of\nScone was last used in 1953 for the coronation of Elizabeth II of the United\nKingdom. The original is in the vaults of Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Robert the Bruce,\nthe hero of Scotland who led &nbsp;Scotland\nduring the Wars of Scottish Independence against England. Was crowned while\nsitting on the original black shiva lingam or stone of scone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Christmas Day 1950,\na group of four Scottish students (Ian Hamilton, Gavin Vernon, Kay Matheson,\nand Alan Stuart) tried to steal this duplicate stone of Scone from Westminster\nAbbey for return to Scotland. In the process of removing it from the Abbey the duplicate\nred stone stone broke into two pieces. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The original&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">black</span></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">meteorite</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">Stone of Scone</span></b> ( from a Kerala Shiva temple in India ) has become a\nHoly&nbsp;Grail in its own right.</span>&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Men and\nwomen have fought to possess it or to obscure it from those unworthy to lay\nclaim to the Stone.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-36Eyj_1pqns/Tjuhr0t_sfI/AAAAAAAAFF0/uJVNmdadhng/s1600/imagesCAGLE0VN.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-36Eyj_1pqns/Tjuhr0t_sfI/AAAAAAAAFF0/uJVNmdadhng/s400/imagesCAGLE0VN.jpg\" width=\"301\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By 1127, the nine original Knights Templar completed their tunnel digging and their leader, Hugues de Payens, went to France and Scotland . He then <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>returning to Jerusalem in 1128 with 300 new Knights.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HbuCpkyqEpk/TjuiIikvz8I/AAAAAAAAFF8/KdpjqKqn-1w/s1600/imagesCAX3YO7J.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HbuCpkyqEpk/TjuiIikvz8I/AAAAAAAAFF8/KdpjqKqn-1w/s400/imagesCAX3YO7J.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-p9HHBkqPUQg/TjuaJ5jth1I/AAAAAAAAFFE/mde4DOgRUI0/s1600/imagesCAES19PF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-p9HHBkqPUQg/TjuaJ5jth1I/AAAAAAAAFFE/mde4DOgRUI0/s400/imagesCAES19PF.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the end of the 12th Century, the Knights Templar were the single richest organization in Christendom -- wealthier <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>than any King or country and wealthier than the Pope and Catholic Church itself. Almost 40% of the land in Spain was under Templar ownership; while in France and England, Templars owned about 25%. During this time, members of the Knights Templar and their relatives were had become related to the leading political and powerful figures of their time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tKp2H2pXS-Y/TjuaBLyr28I/AAAAAAAAFFA/6mJsTfEt7gk/s1600/imagesCA1DLMXF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tKp2H2pXS-Y/TjuaBLyr28I/AAAAAAAAFFA/6mJsTfEt7gk/s400/imagesCA1DLMXF.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope and his Christians continued to use the animosity between the Sunni and Shiite Muslims, playing one against the other as their main defense, till a great Kurd Muslim leader Saladin saw though this and united the two sects. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-i0YR9U4wf3U/TjuZ1FOI15I/AAAAAAAAFE8/nkRqRztjL-Y/s1600/cn.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"418\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-i0YR9U4wf3U/TjuZ1FOI15I/AAAAAAAAFE8/nkRqRztjL-Y/s640/cn.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the THIRD CRUSADE , in a fateful battle on July 4th, 1187 on a plateau between two hills called the Horns of Hattin, Saladin's armies defeated the major Christian force defending Jerusalem. Saladin ransomed all of the surviving nobles, except the surviving Knights Templar <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>who were lined up and, at Saladin's command, had their heads chopped off. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6_wz7tzgT3o/TjuZkqiBZGI/AAAAAAAAFE0/CpWXRY3mrUA/s1600/imagesCACMFOQR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6_wz7tzgT3o/TjuZkqiBZGI/AAAAAAAAFE0/CpWXRY3mrUA/s1600/imagesCACMFOQR.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saladin had <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>successfully re-captured Jerusalem for the Muslims . . Unlike the genocide of the Crusaders a hundred years earlier, there were no scenes of mindless blood letting <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>and slaughter after the European surrender. There was no looting and stealing either. Saladin allowed Richard to take home the relics from the Church of the Sepulchre. </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Y9422iVLCv8/TjuZcDM81II/AAAAAAAAFEw/SNcA_W42igU/s1600/imagesCAS8N7VP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Y9422iVLCv8/TjuZcDM81II/AAAAAAAAFEw/SNcA_W42igU/s320/imagesCAS8N7VP.jpg\" width=\"276\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The captives were permitted to ransom themselves, and those who could afford to do so ransomed their vassals as well. Many thousands could not afford their ransom, and were held to be sold as slaves. The military monks, who could have used their vast wealth to save their fellow Christians from slavery, declined to do so. </span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0MRNKpKSAj0/Tjuv9BssLFI/AAAAAAAAFGs/ZlM_C553nvM/s1600/imagesCAD7YBGF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0MRNKpKSAj0/Tjuv9BssLFI/AAAAAAAAFGs/ZlM_C553nvM/s400/imagesCAD7YBGF.jpg\" width=\"276\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the unransomed prisoners were lead off to a life of slavery, <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Saladin's brother Malik al-Adil suddenly took pity and asked his brother for a thousand of them as a reward for his services, and when he was granted them he immediately gave them their liberty. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2733G2U9YpI/TjuZtvSpQAI/AAAAAAAAFE4/Sj0C8FmVgOg/s1600/untitled.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2733G2U9YpI/TjuZtvSpQAI/AAAAAAAAFE4/Sj0C8FmVgOg/s400/untitled.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Templars used their ill gotten money and constructed more than 300 large cathedrals and 2,000 abbeys and smaller churches. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Some of them are <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>the cathedrals of Notre Dame in Paris (1163), Chartres (1194), Reims (1211) and Amiens (1221) and the famous Temple Church in London.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HzVOsXC0TnM/Tjuv2T35gQI/AAAAAAAAFGo/kBVybybVqKM/s1600/rt.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"517\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HzVOsXC0TnM/Tjuv2T35gQI/AAAAAAAAFGo/kBVybybVqKM/s640/rt.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; In the Ayurvedic system, body is made of water, air, earth, fire and vacuum. Digestion is explained as cooking of food with the help of body-fire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Ayurvedic word for toxins, ama, means, \"crude\" or \"raw\" - residues from faulty or incomplete pepsis that haven't been properly integrated into the body and its functioning, and therefore impede it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">OK, FOLKS, TIMES HAS NOW COME TO BUST A BOMBSHELL WHICH IS GONNA SHIVER YOUR TIMBERS&nbsp;&nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter Orpheus&nbsp;&nbsp;\u2013&nbsp;&nbsp;the Indian seer , a master musician and sitarist,&nbsp;&nbsp;the holy man who brought Pythagoras to Kerala by ship and took him back via Muzris ( Kodungallur\u2014 cultural centre of Calicut king&nbsp;&nbsp;) Bernice&nbsp;&nbsp;( Red sea port of Egypt ) and Alexandria ( Egypt ) .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus was a Brahmachari , a celebate sage who was a veena virtuoso.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Veena is the oldest musical instrument on the planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Jealous Aristotle and Plato tried to paint him as a homosexual and a woman hater, which he was NOT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Herodotus had clearly written that Orpheus who would play divine string music and tame wild animals came from India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus , a strict vegetarian introduced spirituality to Greece&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;He was known for the use of holy theertham from a copper bowl and a Tulsi ( basil) leaf which he used to keep in his mouth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Cicero called Orpheus , the tawny hued , a devotee of Bacchus ( Krishna ) crowned with kissos ( Tulsi).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Western historians and the Pope blurred&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus and Orpheus , and pretty soon it was Jesus who was attributed to all the qualities of Orpheus \u2013 enchanting wild animals with a 7 stringed lyre .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The original sitar ( derived from the veena&nbsp;&nbsp;) has seven strings&nbsp;&nbsp;which run over curved, raised frets ( Rudra / Saraswati veena) , and the remainder are sympathetic strings (tarb,&nbsp;&nbsp;taarif , tarafdaar) which run underneath the frets and resonate in sympathy with the played strings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It was Orpheus who gave Pythagoras&nbsp;&nbsp;the mathematical relations of the notes on the musical scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The wisdom of the ancients has been taught by the philosophers of Greece, but also by people called Jews in Syria, and by Brahmins in India.\"--Megasthenes- 300 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus the tawny hued Hindu Maharishi from Kerala, India gave music to the west.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Before that their music consisted of clanging rocks and shouting nonsense. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus also gave&nbsp;&nbsp;astrology and magic ( mantravadam ),&nbsp;&nbsp;vedic metaphysics ( magna grecia ) from Kerala to the west.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus was a master in astrology, and all Greek astrology is though Orpheus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Greeks spliced on the FAKE story of Eurydice to Orpheus, based on the MIRRORED version of ancient Hindu myth of Savitri and Satyavan.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This is about the efforts of Orpheus to retrieve his wife, Eurydice, (who was killed by a serpent on their wedding night ) from the underworld. Orpheus went down to Hades to claim her, and played so sweetly with his lute that Pluto allowed Eurydice to return to the earth with Orpheus, but on condition that he did not look behind him until he had reached the terrestrial regions. Orpheus, however, in his anxiety to see if she were following him, looked round, and Eurydice disappeared from his sight, instantly and forever.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This LOOKING BACK story is mirrored from the lore of Adi Shankaracharya bringing Devi to Kerala in 2000 BC \u2014&nbsp;&nbsp;he looked back and Devi disappeared at the spot of Mookambika temple at Kollur Karnataka.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Pythagoras learnt metempsychosis from India.&nbsp;&nbsp;Metempsychosis is the Greek equivalent of the 11000 year old Vedic Hindu doctrine of transmigration of the soul, Karma and and reincarnation after death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Almost every Greek text tells that Orpheos was famous for Ahimsa or non-violence . In Euripides' play Hippolytos a father taunts his son with the \"lifeless food\" he eats since taking Orpheos for his \"king.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Orpheus is praised for his knowledge of medicine and astrology ( ONLY Ayurveda and Indian astrology existed those days).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Punch into Google search-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MIHIRA MUNI , THE GREAT ASTROLOGER CUM ASTRONOMER VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The name of India, so far as is known, first appears in Greek literature in the 5th century B.C. in the works of Hekataios and Herodotos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Herodotos of Halikarnassos (484-425 B. C.) whose histories have survived in their entirety had written clearly about India .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Herodotos writes about India's population, saying that the Indians are \"more in number than any nation known to me.\u201d&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">He goes to great details while telling of Kerala\u2019s&nbsp;&nbsp;wealth in gold; He tells about&nbsp;&nbsp;Indian birds and beasts he regards as much bigger than those existing elsewhere, except for horses. Indian clothing he describes as made from wool growing on trees (i.e. cotton) and the amazing thin cotton Calico cloth , we use in Kerala as Mundu ( dhoti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Herodotos' most famous statement about India- that gold is produced in the Indian desert by fierce ants larger than foxes- , which appears to be bull, just for kicks.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unless these large ants were golden jackals who would call a nearby tiger .&nbsp;&nbsp;Such jackals had terrific night vision and sniffing ability ( excellent for bomb detection squads ) and leads the tiger to juicy prey , and then eats the left overs , which the grateful tiger deliberately leave behind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Many Indian seers visited Greece , as in 7000 BC, India ruled Palistan ( Palestine ) . Once when Socrates was asked by an Indian seer, what he does for a living . When Socrates replied that he \"investigated human life,\" the Indian laughed aloud , saying that \"no one was able to observe human affairs if he was ignorant of divine matters and consciousness .\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Vegetarianism in Greece is called Orphikos bios, or \"Orphic way of life\". Only Indians were vegetarians those days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Aristotle ran down OR rather tried to convert Orpheus to be a homosexual like him, just because of a song he wrote about a red-lipped boy on the ship Argos. ( AAHA red lips&nbsp;&nbsp;came out of sucking too hard TEE HEEEE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Both Orpeheus and the converted Pythagoras forbade the sacrifice of animals\u2014so there goes the western theory of animal sacrifice in Indian temples.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Let me quote ( I usually do NOT care for such third party references ) of the parallels between the Orphic path and the yogic as written by Joseph John Campbell :&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201ca system both of thought and practice, exactly paralleling that of Indian asceticism, was communicated by initiated masters to little circles of devotees.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The soul, it was declared, returned repeatedly to life, bound to the wheel of rebirth (compare the Sanskrit samsara).&nbsp;&nbsp;Through asceticism (Sanskrit, tapas), however, the body could be purged of its Titan dross (Sanskrit, mirjara, \u2018shedding\u2019) and the soul released (Sanskrit, moksha, \u2018release\u2019).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Also, rituals fostering meditation on the godly factor were of help (Sanskrit, bhakti, \u2018devotion\u2019).&nbsp;&nbsp;And when, at last, in rapture (samadhi), the initiate cleaved to his own intrinsic being (svasvarupman), he was divine (Shivaham, \u2018I am Shiva.\u2019)\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The gay side kick of Aristotle wrote : \u201c Orpheus so hated women he chose to be reborn as a motherless swan\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is a pity that he visited India , yet he knew nothing of Brahmacharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">However Plato respects Orpheus for his poetry ,the sweet hymns&nbsp;&nbsp;of the hexameter form that revolutionized Greek poetry.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For Greek / Latin classics Homer's Iliad and Odyssey and Virgil's Aeneid have inherent the Dactylic hexameter ( heroic hexameter)&nbsp;&nbsp;a form of meter in poetry or a rhythmic scheme, like the metered Sanskrit verses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The mysterious The Testament of Orpheus was the most important Orphic document for six centuries after it\u2019s \u201cdiscovery\u201d circa 300 AD.&nbsp;&nbsp;In it Orpheus says when in Egypt he met Moses who taught him about monotheism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A circa 350 AD hematite magic amulet, once in the collection of the Berlin Museum, depicted a man crucified on a cross with a moon and seven stars above his head and the words Orpheoc Bakkikoc.&nbsp;&nbsp;It was declared to be a forgery by a furious pope Pius XII.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Orphic doctrine was purely vedic Indian and&nbsp;&nbsp;remained on a mythological plane, interpreting the universe in terms of personalized deities and procreation. Pythagoras refined and rationalized it and grabbed the glory later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A Indian Christian trader named Theophilos, from originally from Kerala and resident in Socotra island ( Aloe vera trade ) undertook several missionary journeys on behalf of the Roman emperor Constantius in the mid-4th century.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;He writes of a small Christian community in on the Malabar coast which traces its origins to Jesus' disciples Thomas and&nbsp;&nbsp;Bartholomew.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Bartholomew is one of the 12 disciples of Jesus and ismentioned in three Synoptic gospels: Matthew,[10:1\u20134] Mark,[3:13\u201319] and Luke,[6:12\u201316] and also appears as one of the witnesses of the Ascension[Acts 1:4,12,13]; however, each time he is named in the company of Philip.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">He is not mentioned in Gospel of John.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In the mid-6th century the Alexandrian merchant Kosmas Indikopleustes (India-navigator- TEE HEEEE ) is reputed to have visited the Malabar coast and Ceylon.&nbsp;&nbsp;Kosmas was the author of a stolen world-geography and a book on stolen Kerala astronomy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In his letter The Orphic Comparison of the Sun to God Ficino explains \u201cIt is certainly in the Sun that visible light is created from the light of consciousness, and there also sight is created from&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">understanding.&nbsp;&nbsp;For there understanding is no different from the light of consciousness, nor sight from visible light.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Consciousness ?&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">TEEE HEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">See, in a few paras I have trashed entire Greek history\u2014</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">The word 'Vatican' itself is derived from the Sanskrit word Vatika, which means Vedic &nbsp;religious centers, such as Yagna-Vatika. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Vatican St Peter\u2019s cathedral was built on top of a Shiva temple.&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The world &nbsp;\"Christianity\" came from the Sanskrit words \"Krishna-neeti\", (the way of Krishna).&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; JETHRO A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WAS A VEGETARIAN..<br />\n<br />\nBULLSHIT BIBLICAL STORIES TALK ABOUT MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT-- SORRY- THERE ARE NO SUCH MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT<br />\n<br />\nJESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED--RED SEA NEVER PARTED--ALL THIS IS A FUCKIN' LIE !<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1), a tribe descending from Keturah, a wife of Abraham (Genesis 25:1-2). Genesis (25:6) describes that Abraham sent the sons of Keturah to the East.<br />\n<br />\nRabbi Menashe Ben Israel (Glazerson, 1984) asserts that Abraham sent them to land of OPHIR ( North Kerala ) by ship<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro.<br />\n<br />\nThen Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.\"<br />\n<br />\nJethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It sounds like Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself. According to Exodus, \"Moses did all that he [Jethro] had said.\"<br />\n<br />\nBefore returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN SEVERAL TIMES THAT JETHRO ( BEING AN INDIAN ) WAS SUBSTITUTED BY JEWS. JETHRO WAS SUNK AND BURIED BY WHITE JEWS<br />\n<br />\nThe first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro<br />\n<br />\nJethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation-- Hindu Jethro instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood<br />\n<br />\nMoses asked Jethro to be his guide<br />\n<br />\nIn The Midrash Rabbah (1977, Vol. 3: Numbers, p. 90) it is stated: \"The east ( OPHIR ) is the source from which light goes forth into the world, and there camped the standard of Judah which bred kings, scholars, and men of pious deeds.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLegends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water with special healing powers from India.<br />\n<br />\nAnd in Volume 1, page 11, of The Legends of the Jews, it is written: \"Beyond the inhabited parts to the east is Paradise with its seven divisions, each assigned to the pious of a certain degree.\"<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_106MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_106BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; below is in one of my old blogs which I penned 8 years ago<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION:<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nFour decades ago, when i was a young boy, I took a bus from Mangalore to Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nOn the passage , the radiator of the bus cracked at midnight somewhere in the middle of no man's land.<br />\n<br />\nI remember, I got hold of another youngster to help me out.<br />\n<br />\nI wanted&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CHOONA</span></b>&nbsp;LIME, SUGAR, FRESH MOTHER'S MILK and RAW KERALA BANANA.<br />\n<br />\nI got everything except the milk.<br />\n<br />\nFinally despite being threatened by the husband of a pretty young lady in burkha nursing a baby, I got the milk.<br />\n<br />\nThis kind and intelligent lady felt that I was doing something right,to save the situation ( in a unsafe area ) and squeezed it into a glass\u2014 despite her husband giving her HAJAAAR tough looks .<br />\n<br />\nThe guy whom I chose to assist me , whispered \u201c Another woman has powder milk-- hum log maar khaane waala hai \u201c<br />\n<br />\nI said \u201c NOPE \u2013that will lack hormones and will NOT make heat resistant strong adhesive putty \u201c<br />\n<br />\nI made a strong adhesive solution which held the hot radiators leak till the next radiator welding workshop in a small town .<br />\n<br />\nChoona was the cement.<br />\n<br />\nSugar was the binder<br />\n<br />\nHormones in fresh \u2013repeat \u2013 fresh mother's milk did the magic catalysis --surprised?<br />\n<br />\nRaw Kerala banana was the resin.<br />\n<br />\nOn ship's which carry corrosive salt we coat the steel of the ship's cargo hold with lime , sugar and cows milk.<br />\n<br />\nAfter that once the salt is discharged, takes at least 300 bars of water pressure from a HP wash Kew machine to get the white compound off the rough steel surface.<br />\n<br />\nSuch a sharp water blade can slice off a human arm clean.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br THIS OASIS WAS A FREE TRADE SPICE OUTPOST..<br />\n<br />\nFROM HERE SPICES WENT TO THE MEDITERRANEAN BY CAMELS--TO PALESTINE ..<br />\n<br />\nFROM THE SEA PORTS OF PALESTINE WHITE JEWS TOOK OVER THE SPICES TO BE TAKEN IN SHIPS TO EUROPE.. &nbsp;MOSES PROMISED HIM THAT ..</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">PEOPLE ASK WHY WAS JETHRO SO COMMITTED TO THE LAND OF PALESTINE?&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;BECAUSE HE WAS FROM THE LAND OF PUNT, WHO CREATED JUDAISM AND THE LANGUAGE HEBREW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ZIPPORAH WOULD LATER CIRCUMCISE HER SON GERSHOM USING A SHARP FLINT (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">WITH COPPER ELEMENT- SECRETS OF AYURVEDA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp; ) \u2014 THE WAY THE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS DID, TO PREVENT INFECTION. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE THREW THE FORESKIN OF HER SONs PENIS , ON THE FEET OF MOSES IN DISGUST FOR BREAKING HIS PROMISE TO HER FATHER JETHRO.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Reference between the messiah and Melchizedek appears in subsequent biblical verses: Genesis 14:18-20; Psalm 110:1-7 Matthew 22:44; 26:26-28 Luke 22:19; Mark 14:22 John 6:53 Acts 2:34 I Corinthians 11:23-25 Hebrews 4:14-15; 5:6; 5:10; 6:19-20; 7:1-21. Revelation 1:6.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Melchizedek is mentioned twice in the Hebrew Bible, the first in Genesis and the second in Psalms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Genesis 14:18 introduces Melchizedek a \"Priest of the Most High God\" (El Elyon), a term which is re-used in 14:19, 20, 22.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The second and final Hebrew Bible mention of Melchizedek is in Psalm 110:4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Lord hath sworn, and will not repent: 'Thou art a priest for ever after the manner of Melchizedek.'. (JPS 1917)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">11Q13 (11QMelch) is a fragment (that can be dated to the end of the 2nd or start of the 1st century BC) of a text about Melchizedek found in Cave 11 at Qumran in the Israeli Dead Sea area and which comprises part of the Dead Sea Scrolls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;In this eschatological text, Melchizedek is seen as a divine being and Hebrew titles such as Elohim are applied to him. According to this text Melchizedek will proclaim the \"Day of Atonement\" and he will atone for the people who are predestined to him. He also will judge the peoples<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The association or identification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity, developing in Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The association or identification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity, developing in Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">According to Encyclop\u00e6dia Britannica, Joseph Smith ( MORMON ) &nbsp;\"appointed his male followers to priesthoods, named for the biblical figures Melchizedek and Aaron, that were overseen by the office of High Priest\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kOuSYUNaGWg/W1hyUVavMeI/AAAAAAABdCs/71o_gbhe9nM9tJHhrxjRI02tDBLZoImjgCLcBGAs/s1600/rrMelchiz-Abe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Just as Melchizedek blessed Abram (and \u201cIt is beyond dispute that the inferior is blessed by the superior\u201d\u2014Heb. 7:7), so also Jethro blesses Moses by helping him judge the people better, thereby demonstrating that Moses is not the savior of the world.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; They are pagan Hindus.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">COLLOSSEUM OF ROME WAS BUILT ON A DRIED UP LAKE.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DURING FLOODING CAUSED BY HEAVY RAINS , THE INSIDES OF THE COLLOSEUM USED TO LOOK LIKE A LAKE.. THIS DOES NOT MEAN THERE WERE SHIPS INSIDE FIGHTING MOCK BATTLES TO ENTERTAIN PUBLIC..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "182", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2448078616863751362/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "814975147028052462", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2011-08-03T23:51:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-01-04T23:47:00+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTQ2NjI1ODIwNDg5Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/nitrogen-padding-from-ashore-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/814975147028052462", "title": "NITROGEN PADDING FROM ASHORE-- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D9qrdHyGZkg/TjmRH4B2PvI/AAAAAAAAFC8/8HEoc5GaZS8/s1600/MT+FAIRCHEM+COLT+1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D9qrdHyGZkg/TjmRH4B2PvI/AAAAAAAAFC8/8HEoc5GaZS8/s320/MT+FAIRCHEM+COLT+1.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nThis is in reponse to a query from capt allen brink vide my blog MY COUSIN VINNY - VADAKAYIL -- dated 28th jan 2011<br />\n<br />\nA lot of chemical tankers have burst their cargo tanks while purging/ drying / padding their tanks, with high pressure shore nitrogen.<br />\n<br />\nUS chemical terminals are the worst culprits -- as they lack elementary commonsense. &nbsp;I have yet to see a US terminal understand vapor return calculations-- and i have dealt with almost all of them.<br />\n<br />\nWhile purging an empty tank with shore nitrogen , make sure that the volume into the tank does NOT exceed the PV valve vent capacity which is 125% of your cargo load capacity usually. <br />\n<br />\nFirst of all Nitrogen cannot be delivered by liquid shore&nbsp;cargo hose--as per USCG rules. Unless they are pigging--or blowing the line. <br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">You must remember that YOUR manifold valve is with you, to prevent excessive overload--nobody is stopping you from throttling this valve, to suit your system. Use it as a reducing valve.</span><br />\n<br />\nPadding loaded tanks must be done by shore vapor hose which complies with USCG 46 CFR 39.20-1(f) ( 1/2/3 ).<br />\n<br />\nThe bursting pressure of such a hose with a one inch hole at 12 o clock position-- &nbsp;is 25 psi where 1 Atmosphere = 14.69 psi. Its MAWP is +5 psi/ -2 psi.<br />\n<br />\nIt may&nbsp;acceptable to keep tankdome one inch open while inerting an empty ship's tank with shore nitrogen , high pressure&nbsp;supplied by liquid cargo hose. -- if this is agreed in writing at the pre-load meeting. ( nobody will sign this sheet , as it is wrong ) . Keep you sailors away on the windward side.<br />\n<br />\nNITROGEN IS LIGHTER THAN AIR.<br />\n<br />\nHere are some actual emails-- glean from it and be safe--<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri;
